extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    Level 4 and registration in a RELS Major or Medial Plan and a GPA of 2.60 in 24.0 units in RELS.
Corequisite    RELS353 or (RELS354 and RELS355).

basic.description: Advanced seminar providing detailed reading of one contemporary theme or thinker in religious studies.
basic.subject: RELS
basic.title: Honours Seminar
